Package util

Class ActionLog

java.lang.Object
util.ActionLog
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminActionLog, EmployeeActionLog
public class ActionLog extends Object
The ActionLog class represents a log of an action performed by a user in the system. Each ActionLog object contains information about the action such as its description, the ID of the user who performed the action, and the time when the action was performed. This class also provides methods for setting and getting the values of these attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionLog

      public ActionLog()
      Default constructor for creating an empty ActionLog object.

    • ActionLog

      public ActionLog(int logId, int user_id, String actionDescription, LocalDateTime actionTime)
      Constructor for creating an ActionLog object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      logId - the ID of the log entry
      user_id - the ID of the user who performed the action
      actionDescription - a description of the action performed
      actionTime - the time when the action was performed

    • ActionLog

      public ActionLog(int user_id, String actionDescription)
      Constructor for creating an ActionLog object with the specified user ID and action description. The log ID is set to 0 and the action time is set to the current time.
      Parameters:
      user_id - the ID of the user who performed the action
      actionDescription - a description of the action performed
